functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:'{"translate":"忍者の小太刀","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(II)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"氷の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"素早い動きを阻害しないよう","color":"white","italic":false}','{"translate":"軽さに拘って作られた小太刀","color":"white","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"N","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" 連舞：壱"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"氷",Tier:2},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"忍者",SkillID:208,Name:"連舞",Level:1,Interval:10,Trigger:"近接攻撃する",Count:32},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.14,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:140,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.315,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.07,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,61],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:21,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:0.9,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
